query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS instructor_cohorts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  instructorId INT NOT NULL,
  cohortName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  courseId INT,
  startDate TIMESTAMP,
  endDate TIMESTAMP,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_instructorId (instructorId),
  INDEX idx_courseId (courseId)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS instructor_cohorts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  instructorId INT NOT NULL,
  cohortName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  courseId INT,
  startDate TIMESTAMP,
  endDate TIMESTAMP,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_instructorId (instructorId),
  INDEX idx_courseId (courseId)
)
